title: Player Rankings System (Lindy's Style)
description: Comprehensive player ranking system displayed as a new Rankings tab in The Lab. Inspired by Lindy's Sports Annual rankings. Includes phase-wise batter/bowler rankings, batter vs bowling type rankings, bowler vs LHB/RHB rankings, best player-vs-player matchups, and overall batter/bowler composite rankings. All rankings since 2023 IPL unless stated. Leverages existing percentile views, phase views, matchup matrix, and thresholds.
